title: Crock Pot Chicken Tacos : Easy Family Dinner Ideas
directions: Combine chicken, beer, apple, onions, garlic & seasonings to slow cooker.
Cook on high for a minimum of 5-6 hours - stirring & turning every few hours
*Note- all slow cookers cook differently - watch your time as you get closer to that 6 hour mark. It may cook faster.
You will know it's done when it falls apart when pierced with a fork
Add to your tacos with your favorite taco ingredients.
ingredients: 1 apple- cut into 4 pieces & the seeds removed
*Taco pairings - tortillas, re-fried beans, cheese, tomatoes, sour cream, lettuce - anything you like to add to your tacos
